thread.title: Oscar-Winning Editor Anne V. Coates to Receive L.A. Film Critics Career Achievement Honor
thread.title_full: Oscar-Winning Editor Anne V. Coates to Receive L.A. Film Critics Career Achievement Honor

title: Oscar-Winning Editor Anne V. Coates to Receive L.A. Film Critics Career Achievement Honor
text:
Oscar-Winning Editor Anne V. Coates t... Oscar-Winning Editor Anne V. Coates to Receive L.A. Film Critics Career Achievement Honor Next Story Prev Story 1 hr ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
Coates, who nabbed the film editing Oscar for her work on 1963's Lawrence of Arabia , will receive the group's career achievement award at a Jan. 9 event. The news was announced Saturday at the critics group's meeting.   Hollywood Reporter.
